mapper.insert:
insert into business_report ( parent_asin, child_asin, title, sku, sessions_total, session_percentage_total, page_views_total, page_views_percentage_total, buy_box, units_order, order_b2b, unit_session_percentage, unit_session_percentage_b2b, sales, sales_b2b, total_order_items, total_order_items_b2b ) values
( #{item.parentAsin}, #{item.childAsin}, #{item.title}, #{item.sku}, #{item.sessionsTotal}, #{item.sessionPercentageTotal}, #{item.pageViewsTotal}, #{item.pageViewsPercentageTotal}, #{item.buyBox}, #{item.unitsOrder}, #{item.orderB2b}, #{item.unitSessionPercentage}, #{item.unitSessionPercentageB2b}, #{item.sales}, #{item.salesB2b}, #{item.totalOrderItems}, #{item.totalOrderItemsB2b} )
